newsitem.title: USA: Parexel files to offer 1.275 mln shares.
newsitem.headline: Parexel files to offer 1.275 mln shares.

text.p: Parexel International Corp said Tuesday that it filed to offer 1,275,000 common shares, plus an additional 15 percent to cover over-allotments.
In a release Tuesday the company said it was offering 1,066,900 shares, and 208,100 are being offered by certain selling stockholders.
Net proceeds to the company would be about $56.6 million, Parexel said, adding that after the offering, it would have about 9.5 million shares outstanding.
Underwriters for the deal include Smith Barney Inc, William Blair & Co and Lehman Brothers, the company said.
